RecorderActivity 000.0 Tap screen to start recording. Recording now. Tap again to stop. Recording finished.
LocationActivity Where did you learn it? Tell us the place where you learned your lullaby. The app will give you suggestions once you typed in the cities name (English names only). Choose a location from the drop down menu to continue. Type in the closest city
UploadActivity Upload Lullaby Submitting lullaby... Lullaby got submitted.<
Lullaby Database Update Updating Locations The app looks for the file \'cities.sql\' in the root directory of the devices sdcard. Press the accept button to update the database. App is updating the location database... Rebuilding Search Table... Database updated. Error updating database. cities.sql is missing or has a wrong format
